pageContext.claim: “And it's unfair that a state that is well-run is really subsidizing states that have been horribly mismanaged. I won't use names but we understand the names. But there are some states that have hundreds of millions and billions of dollars in borrowing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tries to argue that low-tax Republican states are being subsidized by high-tax Democratic states because of the income tax deduction for state and local taxes. This is subject to dispute -- and when you step back and look at the total revenue and spending picture, blue states could make the case that they are subsidizing other states, as various reports show they receive far less in federal spending than they pay in federal taxes.
